data.title: Our Brands | Mars
data.meta_description: For generations, families and their four-legged friends have enjoyed our brands, products and services.
data.text:
Today we have 100,000 Petcare Associates who proudly take care of half of the world's pets through our nutrition, health and services businesses. Our Associates are working toward our Purpose: A Better World for Pets™. Our 50+ global brands include PEDIGREE®, Waltham Center for Pet Nutrition, WHISKAS®, ROYAL CANIN®, AniCura, WISDOM PANEL™ and VCA™.

Our world is a better place when it’s full of smiles. For more than 100 years, we’ve been inspiring moments of everyday happiness through our much-loved treats and snacks like M&M’S®, SNICKERS®, ORBIT® and SKITTLES®. That’s what makes us excited to come to work every day: the chance to make our iconic products even better, share them with even more people and bring even more smiles to the world.

We see food as the fabric of our humanity, bringing people together, nourishing our bodies, and connecting us with our planet.

We believe in better food today to create a better world tomorrow. Our brands like Ben’s Original™, Dolmio®, Tasty Bite®and Seeds of Change™ can positively impact people and the planet. We’re working to deliver 5.5 billion healthy meals a year by 2025.
